data.message: I have a problem seem"s that someone is using my name & face to tell people about some kinda Grant that the Goverment is giving out some money to people. It"s not me sending that to people .  What can be done about this. Me a Concerned Citizen want's to know.

replies.message: Hey Felicia. Impostor accounts aren't allowed on Facebook. If someone created an account pretending to be you, please report it by following these steps: http://bit.ly/2i9Sukw. -Neha
